snippet: Australia is coming around to Jarmila Gajdosova, who switched to playing for Australia from Slovakia in 2008.
abstract: Australia is coming around to Jarmila Gajdosova, who switched to playing for Australia from Slovakia in 2008.
lead_paragraph: PERTH, Australia - Just like on the Australian flag, Australian tennis still has one star who considerably dwarfs the rest.

headline.main: For Gajdosova, a Slow Australian Embrace
